TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MSBuild extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskExtension

summary.span: Implements the MSBuild task.

span.span: Implements the MSBuild task.

summary.span: Use the MSBuild element in your project file to create and execute this task.

span.span: Use the MSBuild element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: For usage and parameter information, see [MSBuild Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76577f6c-7669-44ad-a840-363e37a04d34).

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [MSBuild Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76577f6c-7669-44ad-a840-363e37a04d34).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase implementa la tarea "MSBuild", que entrega archivos de proyecto secundario para el motor de MSBuild que se crea.This class implements the "MSBuild" task, which hands off child project files to the MSBuild engine to be built. Marcado RunInMTA porque no hay ninguna razón que deben ejecutar las tareas de MSBuild en un subproceso distinto de la RequestBuilder que los generó.Marked RunInMTA because there is no reason MSBuild tasks should run on a thread other than that of the RequestBuilder which spawned them.

summary.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the projects specified in the property are built in parallel, if possible.

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the projects specified in the property are built in parallel, if possible.

value.span: Si los proyectos especificados en el propiedad se compilan en paralelo, si es posible; de lo contrario, .

span.span: if the projects specified in the property are built in parallel if possible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El valor predeterminado es `true`.The default value is `true`.

summary.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of property name/value pairs to apply as global properties to the child project.

span.span: A semicolon-delimited list of property name/value pairs to apply as global properties to the child project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se especifica este parámetro, es funcionalmente equivalente a establecer las propiedades que tienen el **/Property** cambiar cuando se compila con.When you specify this parameter, it is functionally equivalent to setting properties that have the **/property** switch when you build with .

summary.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes each target in the list passed to [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] one at a time, instead of at the same time.

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes each target in the list passed to [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] one at a time, instead of at the same time.

value.span: Si la [! INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-MD.MD)] tarea invoca cada destino de la lista que se pasa a [! INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-MD.MD)] uno cada vez; si el [! Tarea include[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-MD.MD)] invoca todos los destinos en la lista al mismo tiempo.

span.span: if the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes each target in the list passed to [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] one at a time; if the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] task invokes all targets in the list at the same time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Establecer esta propiedad en `true` garantiza que los destinos subsiguientes se invocan incluso si no se pudo los destinos previamente invocados.Setting this property to `true` guarantees that subsequent targets are invoked even if previously invoked targets failed. De lo contrario, un error de compilación detendría la invocación de todos los destinos subsiguientes.Otherwise, a build error would stop invocation of all subsequent targets. El valor predeterminado es `false`.The default value is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si no se omiten los archivos de proyecto que no existen en el disco, producirá un error de compilación.If project files that do not exist on the disk are not skipped, they will cause a build error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta propiedad debe establecerse en un valor distinto de `null` para el `MSBuild` tarea unescape propiedades y destinos.This property has to be set to a value other than `null` for the `MSBuild` task to unescape properties and targets.

summary.span: Returns the outputs of the built targets from all the project files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si no se especifica ningún destino en la tarea `MSBuild`, se compilan los destinos predeterminados especificados en los archivos del proyecto.If no targets are specified in the `MSBuild` task, the default targets specified in the project files are built.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El ámbito de los destinos compilados en la caja es (ProjectFileName, GlobalProperties) [TargetNames] como una lista de elementos de compilación.The scope of built targets in the cash is (ProjectFileName, GlobalProperties)[TargetNames] as a list of build items. Esta propiedad ya no se usa en la versión 4.0.This property is no longer used in version 4.0.
